18 import rospy
19 from threading import Lock
20 
21 from ..common.abstract_fans_manager import AbstractFansManager
22 from .rpi_io_objects import Fan
23 
24 
25 class FansManager(AbstractFansManager):
26 
27  def __init__(self):
28  super(FansManager, self).__init__()
29 
30  lock = Lock()
31  self._fans_list = [
32  Fan(lock,
33  fan["pin"],
34  "FAN_{}".format(fan["pin"]),
35  fan["temperature_on_threshold"],
36  fan["temperature_off_threshold"]) for fan in rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_rpi/fans")
37  ]
38 
39  rospy.loginfo("Fan Manager - Started")
